ivardefs.name: abnormalCodedValueSet
ivardefs.desc: The set of abnormal coded results for the observation conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: approvalDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the asset content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

ivardefs.name: bodySite
ivardefs.desc: The site on the subject's body where the  observation is to be made.

ivardefs.name: category_
ivardefs.desc: A code that classifies the general type of observation.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: Describes what will be observed. Sometimes this is called the observation "name".

ivardefs.name: component_
ivardefs.desc: Some observations have multiple component observations, expressed as separate code value pairs.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

ivardefs.name: copyright
ivardefs.desc: Copyright statement relating to the ObservationDefinition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: criticalCodedValueSet
ivardefs.desc: The set of critical coded results for the observation conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: For draft definitions, indicates the date of initial creation. For active definitions, represents the date of activation. For withdrawn definitions, indicates the date of withdrawal.

ivardefs.name: derivedFromCanonical_
ivardefs.desc: The canonical URL pointing to another FHIR-defined ObservationDefinition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

ivardefs.name: derivedFromUri_
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally-defined observation definition, guideline or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the ObservationDefinition from the consumer's perspective.

ivardefs.name: device
ivardefs.desc: The measurement device used to produce observations of this type.

ivardefs.name: effectivePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period during which the ObservationDefinition content was or is planned to be effective.

ivardefs.name: experimental
ivardefs.desc: A flag to indicate that this ObservationDefinition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

ivardefs.name: hasMember_
ivardefs.desc: This ObservationDefinition defines a group  observation (e.g. a battery, a panel of tests, a set of vital sign measurements) that includes the target as a member of the group.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this ObservationDefinition. by the performer and/or other systems. These identifiers remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

ivardefs.name: jurisdiction_
ivardefs.desc: A jurisdiction in which the ObservationDefinition is intended to be used.

ivardefs.name: lastReviewDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the asset content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after that, but doesn't change the original approval date.

ivardefs.name: method
ivardefs.desc: The method or technique used to perform the observation.

ivardefs.name: multipleResultsAllowed
ivardefs.desc: Multiple results allowed for observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: normalCodedValueSet
ivardefs.desc: The set of normal coded results for the observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: performerType
ivardefs.desc: The type of individual/organization/device that is expected to act upon instances of this definition.

ivardefs.name: permittedDataType_
ivardefs.desc: The data types allowed for the value element of the instance observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: preferredReportName
ivardefs.desc: The preferred name to be used when reporting the results of observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: publisher
ivardefs.desc: Helps establish the "authority/credibility" of the ObservationDefinition. May also allow for contact.

ivardefs.name: purpose
ivardefs.desc: Explains why this ObservationDefinition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

ivardefs.name: qualifiedInterval_
ivardefs.desc: Multiple  ranges of results qualified by different contexts for ordinal or continuous observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: quantitativeDetails
ivardefs.desc: Characteristics for quantitative results of this observation.

ivardefs.name: specimen
ivardefs.desc: The kind of specimen that this type of observation is produced on.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The current state of the ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: An absolute URL that is used to identify this ObservationDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this ObservationDefinition is (or

ivardefs.name: useContext_
ivardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching of observation definitions.

ivardefs.name: validCodedValueSet
ivardefs.desc: The set of valid coded results for the observations  conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

ivardefs.name: version
ivardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the ObservationDefinition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the ObservationDefinition author and is not expected to be globall

properties.desc: Set of definitional characteristics for a kind of observation or measurement produced or consumed by an orderable health care service.
